original_title: The Fable of the Family That Did Too Much For Nellie
overview: The Todd family had no success in finding a suitable cook, and after firing the thirteenth one that month, they went to an employment agency and secured the services of Nellie, the prize cook. Nellie was there like a duck when it came to cooking, and they didn't understand how they got along without her before.
title: The Fable of the Family That Did Too Much For Nellie
